product_name: The North Face Buttery Bunting - Infant Girls'
long_description: Velvety soft and cozy, The North Face Buttery bunting swaddles your baby girl in fleece warmth from head to toe with fold-over mittens for extra protection from the cold. Warm, breathable fleece dries quickly, insulates even when wet and is easy to care for. Zippers on both sides allow easy entry and exit. Fold-over mittens; fleece hood with binding.
short_description: Velvety soft and cozy, The North Face Buttery bunting swaddles your baby girl in fleece warmth from head to toe with fold-over mittens for extra protection from the cold.
subcategory: Kids' Snowsuits, Rain Suits And Buntings
